step_data.thought: I can see that I've successfully created a new email template called 'Customer Service Response Template' as evidenced by the success message 'You saved the email template.' visible on the page. The template is now listed in the Email Templates grid (I can see it as the last entry with ID 15). My goal was to create a new Email Template for customer communications, which I have now completed. The template has been saved with the name 'Customer Service Response Template', the subject 'Your Customer Service Request - Response from Our Team', and appropriate HTML content for customer service responses. Since I've successfully completed the requested task, I should inform the user.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully created a new email template for customer communications. The template has been saved with the name "Customer Service Response Template" and includes a professional format for responding to customer inquiries. The template is now available in your list of email templates and can be used for customer communications.')
